detaileddescription.para: Macro that is used to store paths to data groups
Macro that is used to store paths to data groups
Macro that is used to store paths to data groups

briefdescription.para: Load neutral data from HDF5 file and prepare parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads the 1D neutral data from file f, fills the offload struct with parameters and allocates and fills the offload array.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array
QID of the data that is to be read

briefdescription.para: Load neutral data from HDF5 file and prepare parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads the 3D neutral data from file f, fills the offload struct with parameters and allocates and fills the offload array.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array
QID of the data that is to be read

briefdescription.para: Initialize neutral data from HDF5 file.

parameterdescription.para: HDF5 file identifier for a file which is opened and closed outside of this function
pointer to offload data struct which is initialized here
pointer to offload array which is allocated and initialized here
QID of the data that is to be read

simplesect.para: zero if reading and initialization succeeded

briefdescription.para: Module for reading neutral data from HDF5 file.

detaileddescription.para: Neutral data must be read by calling hdf5_neutral_init_offload() contained in this module. This module contains reading routines for all neutral data types.
